title: Perf fix the custom implementations of Stream in binary logger processing
body:
### Context

Couple custom stream implementations were introduced as part of binlog forward compatibility / secrets redaction efforts.
Those will need attention. See https://github.com/dotutils/streamutils/pull/2 for more details

### Goal

Adopt changes from https://github.com/dotutils/streamutils/pull/2
Compare perf numbers before and after.


### Notes

This might supersed https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10467
